We encourage participants to join us from any background and experience. 

Just let us know you're interested below - and we'll be in touch with details for joining on the day.

- [Join us](mailto:katharine.sherratt@lshtm.ac.uk?subject=Register%20to%20join%3A%20Evaluation%20and%20Responsible%20Modelling&body=Please%20share%20details%20to%20join%20the%20workshop%20on%20Evaluation%20and%20Responsible%20Modelling.)

#### Participant support

There is no cost to attend.

We will provide lunch and refreshments. 
We have some funds available to support UK travel, and support adjustments for accessibility wherever possible.

Please email Kath at [katharine.sherratt@lshtm.ac.uk](mailto:katharine.sherratt@lshtm.ac.uk) for more information and support with travel or accessibility.

#### Workshop materials

We are unable to provide recordings of the workshop. All workshop materials will be available on this website.
